original_title: The Mystery of the Yellow Sunbonnet
overview: George Cathcart, a young naval officer, arrives home on leave of absence after months of mine planting service. Major Maynard, a foreign spy, occupies the adjoining estate. With the assistance of Jessica, an adventuress, Maynard plans to obtain the maps in Cathcart's possession.
title: The Mystery of the Yellow Sunbonnet
